title: Boosting?
body: IS there any way to report someone for being boosted?

replies.body: Well what type of request do i choose exactily

Our automated systems are pretty good at catching these, but I appreciate your willingness to be on the lookout for this type of activity. You can help out by sending us a report via [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you have any questions.
